name: Lumberjack Revision CDTV/CD32 Commodore Amiga
description:
Lumberjack Revision for Amiga CDTV/CD32 with CDDA music with ambiance sfx

Code & ingame music - Cobe

Gfx - Koyot 1222

Title music - Simone JMD

Testing and support - Lemming880

Move Lumberjack left and right of the tree to chop wood making sure to avoid

the deadly branches. The game is also over when the timer expires.

Controls:

Keyboard: left/right arrow keys

Joystick: left/right

M - Turn ingame music on/off

Bonus Items:

-High heels: Slows down energy loss

-Panties: Recharges energy

-Bra: Gives 25 points

-Collect 3 different items to turn on Switch Mode. Switching sides gives 10

 points.

-Beer bottle: Shakes your screen thus slowing you down a bit while you chop for a while.
Ends switch Switch Mode.

In the options menu, if you chose Hard difficulty, picking up the beer

bottle will reverse your controls for a while.

Updates from Reloaded to Revision:

---------------------------------

-CDDA music with ambiance sfx

-Tree is no longer infint. Though trees are pretty tall and get taller by every level

you're able to reach the top of it and the end of the level.

There's 8 levels. Odd ones are spring/summer themed. Even ones are winter themed.
-In odd levels there's a bee that can stun you for a short period.

-Screen shakes while you're drunk ;)

*Video shown on this page is for Lumberjack Reloaded version
